text: @GOPLeader @realDonaldTrump @HouseGOP @SteveScalise @RepLizCheney @MacTXPress @RodneyDavis The decision to leave the United States off the list — lumping travelers from Brazil and Russia — was a high-profile rebuke of the Trump administration’s handling of the coronavirus crisis. Great job Trump - we lead the world in deaths and cases of COVID19!
